ygData.subject: Lvl 12 Pet
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve just made lvl12 as a DE Necro last night.  First thing to purchase was Convoke Shadow, the new pet spell -- imagine my suprise when the first pet I
ygData.messageBody:
I've just made lvl12 as a DE Necro last night. First thing to purchase
was Convoke Shadow, the new pet spell -- imagine my suprise when the
first pet I summoned coned green to me!!! What gives, I though pets
were supposed to range 11-13, but my green pet was lvl 8. Initially I
thought it was due to my conjuration skill being low, around 45, but
I've raised it up to around 65 and still had cast a green one. I was
sucessfull in casting a lvl 12 pet twice and few 10-11, but I'm yet to
cast a lvl 13. Does anyone know if we just get weaker pets at this
level or what is going on?

thanks

Noriamus of Povar
